member.name: M:ContactApi.Controllers.ContactAndSkillController.GetContactAnsSkillTable
member.summary: Return the list of all contact and skill links.

member.name: M:ContactApi.Controllers.ContactAndSkillController.GetContactAndSkillFromContact(System.Int64)
member.summary: Return the contact and skill link where the contact id corresponds to id.

member.name: M:ContactApi.Controllers.ContactAndSkillController.GetContactAndSkillFromSkill(System.Int64)
member.summary: Return the contact and skill link where the skill id corresponds to id.

member.name: M:ContactApi.Controllers.ContactAndSkillController.PutContactAndSkill(System.Int64,ContactAndSkill)

member.name: M:ContactApi.Controllers.ContactAndSkillController.PostContactAndSkill(ContactAndSkill)
member.summary: Create a new contact and skill link.

member.name: M:ContactApi.Controllers.ContactAndSkillController.DeleteContactAndSkillDeleteContact(System.Int64)
member.summary: Delete all the contact and skill links where the id appears as a contact.

member.name: M:ContactApi.Controllers.ContactAndSkillController.DeleteContactAndSkillDeleteSkill(System.Int64)
member.summary: Delete all the contact and skill links where the id appears as a skill.

member.name: M:ContactApi.Controllers.ContactAndSkillController.DeleteContactAndSkill(System.Int64)
member.summary: Delete the contact and skill link corresponding to id.

member.name: M:ContactApi.Controllers.ContactController.GetContact
member.summary: Return the list of all contacts.

member.name: M:ContactApi.Controllers.ContactController.GetContact(System.Int64)
member.summary: Return the contact corresponding to id.

member.name: M:ContactApi.Controllers.ContactController.PutContact(System.Int64,Contact)
member.summary: Modify the contact corresponding to id.

member.name: M:ContactApi.Controllers.ContactController.DeleteContact(System.Int64)
member.summary: Delete the contact corresponding to id.
member.remark: You must also request DELETE: api/ContactAndSkill/deleteContact/{id} to ensure that there are no unexisting ids in this table

member.name: M:ContactApi.Controllers.SkillController.DeleteSkill(System.Int64)
